rows.label: tlk70000054_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Those friends of yours you brought the
other day are doing great, by the way.

rows.label: tlk70000054_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Isabella's a veteran. Great to have her
on board. And Luc's green, but he's
showing tons of promise already.

rows.label: tlk70000054_03_msg0004
rows.name:
The Four Muskerpon?
Ah, well, they can't all be winners...

rows.label: tlk70000054_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Together, the four of them just
about make one competent recruit.

rows.label: tlk70000054_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't worry, though. I've taken them
under my wing, so as long as they stick
around they should learn something.
